ing: 1 (3 ounce) package lemon flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
1 (3 ounce) package lime flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, with juice
1 (16 ounce) package small curd cottage cheese
des: "Fruity and cheesy with a little bite. Make the salad firmer by including one small package of prepared unflavored gelatin. Walnuts may be used instead of pecans."
ins:
In a 9x13 inch dish, mix lemon flavored gelatin mix, lime flavored gelatin mix and boiling water. When the mixes are completely dissolved, pour in remaining water. Chill in the refrigerator 1 hour, or until the gelatin begins to set.
Stir in the crushed pineapple, cottage cheese, horseradish, mayonnaise and pecans. Continue to chill 3 hours, or until completely gelled.
